H0.text: What is the county town of Mayo. Westport

H1.text: What is the county town of Mayo. Ballina

H2.text: What is the county town of Mayo. Castlebar alternative spelling 'Castlebury'

H3.text: What is the county town of Mayo. Catlebar

A4.text: Castlebar (Irish: Caisle√°n an Bharraigh, meaning 'Barry's Castle') is the county town of County Mayo, Ireland.

A5.text: This castle is depicted as part of the town's coat of arms, with two yew trees on either side because Castlebar is the county town of Mayo (Irish: Maigh Eo, meaning 'plain of the yew trees').
